title: Network Services Gateway
description: Specify configuration for Nuage MetroAE NSGvs.

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the NSGv VM on the hypervisor/vcenter

target_server_type.title: Target Server type
target_server_type.description: Type of environment into which the NSGv will be instantiated

target_server.title: Target Server hostname
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor or vCenter server where the NSGv will be instantiated

bootstrap_method.title: Bootstrap Method
bootstrap_method.description: In the current MetroAE version, NSGv bootstrapping is not supported.  Bootstrap method for the NSGv. The default is 'none' which means no bootstrap will be performed. 'zfb_metro' creates a boostrap ISO file based on the contents of the file zfb_vars.yml. 'zfb_external' is used when a 3rd-party ISO file is to be used.

iso_path.title: External Bootstrap ISO File Directory
iso_path.description: Local path to the 3rd-party ISO file to use for bootstrap. Only required when bootstrap_method id set to 'zfb_external'

iso_file.title: External Bootstrap ISO File Name
iso_file.description: Name of the 3rd-party ISO file to use for bootstrap. Only required when bootstrap_method id set to 'zfb_external'

nsgv_mac.title: NSGV MAC Address
nsgv_mac.description: MAC address the proxy will use to recognize the NSGV at boot/DHCP time. Only required when bootstrap_method is set to 'zfb_metro'

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter
vcenter_datacenter.description: vCenter datacenter, only applicable for vcenter server type and defaults to global settings

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster
vcenter_cluster.description: vCenter cluster, only applicable for vcenter server type and defaults to global settings

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore
vcenter_datastore.description: vCenter datastore, only applicable for vcenter server type and defaults to global settings

vsd_license_file.title: NSG License File
vsd_license_file.description: Path to the VSD license file on the MetroAE host to associate with the NSG
vsd_license_file.sectionBegin: NSG Zero-Factor Bootstrap Parameters for type zfb_metro

nsg_organization.title: NSG Organization
nsg_organization.description: Organization on the VSD to associate with the NSG being bootstraped

nsg_name.title: NSG Name
nsg_name.description: Name of the NSG on the VSD

nsg_proxy_user_first_name.title: NSG Proxy User's First Name
nsg_proxy_user_first_name.description: First name of the user to bootstrap the NSG

nsg_proxy_user_last_name.title: NSG Proxy User's Last Name
nsg_proxy_user_last_name.description: Last name of the user to bootstrap the NSG

nsg_proxy_user_email.title: NSG Proxy User's Email Address
nsg_proxy_user_email.description: Email address of the user to bootstrap the NSG

nsg_proxy_user_password.title: NSG Proxy User's Password
nsg_proxy_user_password.description: Password of the user to bootstrap the NSG

nsg_infra_profile_name.title: NSG Infra Profile Name
nsg_infra_profile_name.description: Name of the NSG infra profile on the VSD

nsg_infra_profile_nsg_template_name.title: NSG Infra Profile Template Name
nsg_infra_profile_nsg_template_name.description: Name of the NSG infra profile template on the VSD

nsg_infra_profile_proxy_dns_name.title: NSG Infra Profile Proxy DNS Name
nsg_infra_profile_proxy_dns_name.description: Name of the NSG infra profile proxy DNS on the VSD

vsc_infra_profile_name.title: VSC Infra Profile Name
vsc_infra_profile_name.description: Name of the VSC infra profile for the NSG on the VSD

vsc_infra_profile_first_controller.title: VSC Infra Profile First Controller
vsc_infra_profile_first_controller.description: Host name or IP address of the VSC infra profile first controller for the NSG

vsc_infra_profile_second_controller.title: VSC Infra Profile Second Controller
vsc_infra_profile_second_controller.description: Host name or IP address of the VSC infra profile second controller for the NSG

nsg_network_port_name.title: NSG Network Port Name
nsg_network_port_name.description: Name of the network port for the NSG

nsg_network_port_physical_name.title: NSG Network Port Physical Name
nsg_network_port_physical_name.description: Physical name of the network port for the NSG

nsg_access_port_name.title: NSG Access Port Name
nsg_access_port_name.description: Name of the access port for the NSG

nsg_access_port_physical_name.title: NSG Access Port Physical Name
nsg_access_port_physical_name.description: Physical name of the access port for the NSG

nsg_access_port_vlan_range.title: NSG Access Port VLAN Range
nsg_access_port_vlan_range.description: VLAN range of the access port for the NSG

nsg_access_port_vlan_number.title: NSG Access Port VLAN Number
nsg_access_port_vlan_number.description: VLAN number of the NSG access port for the NSG
nsg_access_port_vlan_number.sectionEnd: NSGv Zero-Factor Bootstrap Parameters for type zfb_metro
